description: Try our easy to follow Easy burrito bowl recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Burrito bowl,Roast,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Pumpkin,Sesame free,Wheat free,Rice,Tomato
name: Easy burrito bowl Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 750g butternut pumpkin, peeled, cut into 2cm cubes

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 200°C. Toss pumpkin and 1 tbs of the oil in a roasting pan. Season with salt. Roast for 30 minutes or until tender and lightly caramelised.
Meanwhile, combine tomato, parsley, spring onion, vinegar and 1 tbs oil in a bowl. Season to taste and set aside.

Heat remaining oil in a frying pan. Add onion and corn and cook stirring occasionally for 5 minutes. Add garlic, jalapeños and spices and cook for 2 minutes or until fragrant. Stir in beans and 2 tbs water and cook until heated through. Add pumpkin and lime juice and stir until heated.
Heat rice according to directions on packet. Spoon into warm bowls, top with pumpkin mixture and cheese, and finish with tomato salsa. Serve with corn chips, if desired.
